bug.author: Gorosia
bug.description: Thanks for this wonderful implementation of VIBE! I followed your 'README.md' file. 'demo.py', 'eval.py' worked. But when I try training VIBE. I got error 'NameError: name 'Insta' is not defined' I already download 'insta_train_db.h5'. How can I solve this problem? Thanks!

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Gorosia>@Gorosia</denchmark-link> , My latest commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/commit/8e7d65bd898394f543d212f9cc7b12381bf46803>8e7d65b</denchmark-link> should solve this. Could you pull and try again?
